name: Zombie Fun Run
description: Join IRA, Crossing Guard Robot 2nd class, as he joins the Zombie Fun Run circuit and saves the day with the power of friendship and heavy artillery in this turn-based comedy RPG.

name: The Wizard Gnome Quest
description:
The Wizard Gnome have to cross the forest to find the Druids to buy some ingredients for his next potion, help him to dodge the dangers with your magical SPACE BAR and your spell SHIFT

You can play the game here : https://guigotsu.com/gnome/

name: Solitary Echoes
description: You were a technical support engineer on a geoforming outpost on LV-513, tasked with changing a very important light bulb when the outpost was overrun by a hostile alien lifeform. During the attack you managed to grab some supplies and lock yourself into a maintenance room. After some days, the noise and the screams from outside slowly die down. After some weeks, your supplies slowly run out. Time to head out. See what's going on. Find help. Survive.

name: Hardware Store Simulator
description: Compete with up to 4 players to build the most successful hardware store! Design your shop, manage inventory, hire employees, and influence market prices in this detailed business simulator. Master retail management as you expand your store empire.

name: Report: Stas
description: Report: Stas is a prequel to the second part of the Report series. It will tell you a story, about a former Black Mesa security guard by the name of Stas. Events take place 2 hours before Gerald's arrival.

name: Report II
description: continuation of Gerald's adventures only within city 19, but 20 years after stasis. New secrets, new acquaintances, new villains are waiting for you in the second part.

name: Follow The Banner
description:
Follow the Banner is a multiplayer strategic medieval warfare game.
Two armies composed of players (or bots) fight in turn-based battles on hexagon maps.

name: Morgan's Skate Club
description: A skateboarding game with similar controls to classic Tony Hawk games. With four lively skateparks to choose from, take control of various skaters and perform strings of crazy tricks. Talk up all the animal ladies too. Show off your skills and unlock more animal ladies on skateboards.

name: Inheritance of Ash
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Super Marisa World Fusion
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Fusion: Revival
description: SMF:R was a side project to Mushroom Kingdom Fusion, with a larger focus on Mario-esque gameplay.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Netherforce Shards
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Unnamed Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bros. MM
description: Sin descripción

name: Wario Land Remix
description: Wario Land Remix is a platformer puzzle-solving game which will adapt into a SNES Appearance with Wario as the mascot in his remake misadventures from before and with upcoming new chapters along the way.

name: New Super Luigi U Remastered Edition
description: New Super Luigi U Remastered Edition is a fangame created by the Core Dev Team in order to bring the Mario community together in a fun way.

name: Comic Book Universe
description: With a fully-customizable, easily editable game universe that has been designed to give you extreme flexibility, CBU sees the user take control of the forces of good from far and wide to stand up against the tide of evil. The game features highly-detailed tactical battles between teams of unique characters who can evolve as the game progresses, ongoing storylines that constantly shift the game world, betrayals and heated rivalries, factions that can see members come and go, all leading to an ultimate Battle For The Universe that sees the most powerful characters fight for supremacy!

name: Mario vs. Windows 95
description: Mario vs. Windows 95 is a platformer which intends to be a throwback to the early days of MFGG fangaming. Inspired by Supertoad2k's Yoshi vs. Windows, the game has Mario, with the help of the spirit of Bill Gates, fighting against an evil virus which is attempting to take over his newly purchased computer.

name: Mario FA: Vanishing Colosseum
description: Sin descripción

name: Rottenroots
description: Rottenroots is a branching narrative role-playing game set in a dystopian world where conformity means survival. Guide Salem through moral dilemmas, time-pressured choices, and dynamic character interactions. Your decisions shape his personality, relationships, and fate in this gripping story.

name: The Indirect Castle Retreat
description: A third person exploration adventure game. Walk, run, and jump as you explore the castle. Pick up useful items to progress. Look at objects of interest to understand the history of the castle.

name: Saga of Guardians
description: Saga of Guardians is a unique collectible card game and auto battler. Build YOUR deck, place your cards strategically and climb the ranks in the PVP Arena.

name: Slime 3k: Demake
description: A blob of goo, initially used to nourish artificial humans, has become sentient and risen up against its creator—the Despot, an evil AI and the unfortunate ruler of the world in the year 3000! The future is bleak, and humanity is beyond redemption, but at least you have the power to save yourself. This demake is a mini-version of the game Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot.

name: Beat, Heart, Beat
description: Beat, Heart, Beat is an autoscrolling rhythm-platformer centered around slashing through enemies to the music to maintain your momentum and traverse your way towards your own heart. There are three directions to slash - up, down and right in front of you. Slash in the correct direction to aim your attacks at enemies and dash into them. Performing a series of slashes to the correct rhythmic pattern is the key to reaching the end of the stage and advancing onwards to your heart.

name: Soul Armors Recollect
description: Soul Armors Recollect is a single player RPG about a journey of recollection. Smash up your enemies with various weapons and skills. Explore and collect equipment and items as you try to remember why you're left with only your armor.

name: Patient Seven
description: Revive seven sickly creatures in a short adventure through a surreal, vibrant world.

name: Empire Builder: Europe
description: Empire Builder train game boardgames brought to the digital world. Starting with Empire builder - Europe as the base game, we will release each of the games in this series for all to enjoy.

name: Blip's Supermassive Adventure
description: Play as a tiny black hole named Blip and adventure out into the cosmos, absorbing your enemies' powers and exploring several space-themed levels in order to save your best friend, a star named Shimmy! All the while proving just how supermassive you can really be!

name: Protocol Rift
description: Third-person action-adventure game that seamlessly blends intense bullet hell combat with thought-provoking puzzles. Dive into the high-stakes world of digital warfare as an ethical robot hacker. Your mission? To infiltrate a fortified network and overthrow the tyrannical central AI controlling it.

name: Dante's Ring
description: Face the forces of nature during a volcanic eruption and walk the fine line between two worlds on a mystery-filled island. Descend into the depths of hell to save as many lost beings as possible in an anti-combat, action RPG.

name: Void Dungeon
description: Void Dungeon brings you a 2D Action RPG with intense hack & slash combat, deep character options, and unyielding enemies, which you can face solo or with up to 4 friends. Oh, and quirky costumes. Because it’s better to look good when the void consumes you.

name: Hobnobbers
description: Pillage the mall with your friends, fight murderous Pixys, and worship a divorcée Lady Goddess.

name: Outworld Station
description: Take the helm as a new Station Commander and exploit an alien star system in this stunning space-station factory automation game. Amass resources and construct starships using increasingly advanced manufacturing and expand your station in a hostile universe!

name: Kathy Rain 2: Soothsayer
description: In this point-and-click urban thriller, down-and-out private eye Kathy Rain will embark on her most dangerous case yet — the pursuit of the notorious serial killer known as the Soothsayer. Find clues, gather evidence, connect the dots, and confront the murderer before the hunter becomes the hunted…

name: Don't Wake the Beast
description: In Don't Wake the Beast, a roguelite stealth game, you’ll sneak through ever-changing dungeons to steal precious treasures guarded by deadly beasts. Use your trusty grappling hook to evade traps, outsmart enemies, and solve puzzles. But beware—each treasure you claim makes escaping more dangerous!

name: We are Warriors!
description: Sin descripción

name: Survius
description:
Survius is an open world, multiplayer, zombie survival game.
Roam the deserted island and claim whatever you desire. Land, loot, friends or bodies, it's all yours for the taking.

Find and choose a playstyle that fits your preferences. Be a humble farmer, a ruthless bounty hunter, or anything in between.

Roam the open world map, exploring towns, hovels, mountains, and lakes.

Claim whatever land and loot you find.

Whether you find a place to call home, or call the whole island your home. The choice is yours.

You are not alone on this island, and it will be up to you to decide whether you help or hinder your fellow man.

Form clans and alliances. Or go another route, and spark conflict to come out on top.

Who will you trust? Who will to trust you? Many or few, it's your decision to make.

Zombies aren't the only threat here.

While some animals may be gentle or fear you, other are a far bigger threat than the undead.

Will you bring home a meal, or be the meal yourself?

name: Deliverance
description: Deliverance is a remake for Deliverance: Stormlord II.

name: Rec
description: Set in a parallel world, REC presents a thought-provoking narrative where Ukraine is universally recognized as a force for good and is heavily supported with advanced weaponry. The story begins with a Russian soldier who uncovers a secret plan designed to ignite a nuclear war, only to be killed immediately after his discovery. Players take on the role of a soldier, viewed through a bodycam, tasked with eliminating enemies in hyper-realistic environments. As you progress, you’ll uncover clues and traces leading to the deeper truth about this alternate reality in Ukraine.

name: Touhou Mario 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Lightvayne: Adventure on Volcanus Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Crimes Against Slimes
description:
Crimes Against Slimes is a game where you fight against the never-ending slime hordes, gain upgrades as you level up, and do whatever you can to survive as long as you can.

It is a survival game where all you can do is run away and shoot the enemies that constantly hunt you down. At first, the slime horde might seem unbeatable but the stronger you get the more you formidable an opponent you become!

name: Sand Saga
description: The Sand Saga is a next-gen falling-sand game, built on the Sand Game JS engine. Do whatever you want in the sandbox or complete missions and challenges. The game is actively being developed with an update every two weeks on Sunday and a new blog post at the end of each month.

name: The Legend of Zelda: King of Thieves
description: Sin descripción

name: Kings of Edom
description: Kings of Edom is a fantasy adventure that places you as the lone hero exploring twelve levels of mazes in your quest to find the lost crowns. Each game is unique, as an ancient spell causes the maze to bend and swirl into a new challenge when you start a new game. Monsters and traps will hinder your journey, while treasures of steel and magic will allow you to grow in might. The goal of the game is to retrieve 11 lost crowns, which will require many journeys through the dungeon. Once you have all the crowns, find the white star and perform the ritual to honor the kings.

name: Pyun Pyun Heart Throbbing Endless Love Bakery
description: Romance or befriend four lovable characters in this point-and-click visual novel as you uncover the mysteries of the town you've moved into! Make a name for yourself as you interact with these charming new characters! Or perhaps. . . familiar faces?

name: Ninjabun
description: The village needs you Ninjabun! Answer the Call. Forge your Carrotana. Hack & Slash your way through countless enemies in action rogue-like combat and go for a high score!

name: Dread Days
description: Become a rebel Webrunner and explore the hazardous, futuristic metropolis of Gorod 01 in search of solution to an unstoppable spider swarm. Walk on walls, manipulate electricity and survive against the deadly Party and its cyborg abominations.

name: Gamma Strain
description: Gamma Strain is an intense third-person co-op horror shooter. Gear up, create unique builds and synergies, and battle terrifying creatures. Teamwork, tactics, and flawless execution are key to your survival.

name: Paw Brawl Party
description: Get 2-4 friends together and challenge them in this online multiplayer party game with a constantly changing gameplay. Custom and adapt your loadout to be the last standing brawler.

name: Mario's Nightmare Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Dawn of Decay
description: Dawn of Decay is a 3D low poly multiplayer zombie survival game where players team up to navigate immersive maps, fend off relentless zombie waves, and rely on strategic gameplay to survive.

name: VR-Kanojo
description: – An unexplored world for just the two of you is here! - The long-awaited new work from the producer of "VR Kanojo" is even more fun and cuter than ever! --Introducing "VR-Kanojo"-- Experience the special moment everyone dreams of: your girlfriend visiting your room for the first time!

name: Sunchaser
description: Bring light back to the darkening town of Mallard by exploring its monster-infested outskirts, hearing its residents' stories, and defeating the dangerous pets of a mastermind light-stealer in this simple top-down adventure inspired by a love of exploring one's own neighborhood.

name: Neon City Hacker
description: Point and click adult game in a cyberpunk city.

name: Corbel
description: Play as a giant and build your ideal medieval city in this tiny city builder. Pick up villagers and command them to do your bidding while defending them from hoards of pillaging gnomes.

name: Remnants of Flesh
description: Return peace to Oakley City and battle against cultists and nightmarish creatures to uncover your past.

name: Werner Waffenwerke: Arms Tycoon
description: Take on the role of a weapons manufacturer and lead your company to fame and fortune. Develop weapons and sell what you can!

name: Luxcustos
description: Luxcustos is a team-based Multiplayer First-Person-Shooter with CTF mechanics.

name: Glass Horizon
description: Experience the freedom of parkour in "Glass Horizon." Leap across rooftops, overcome obstacles, and explore a futuristic city. With fluid movements and thrilling challenges, your skills will be put to the test. Are you ready to conquer the horizon?

name: Soul Injector Commando
description: FPS where you are tasked by God to give souls to the wealthiest people on Earth, helping them get normal jobs and be productive members of society.

name: Heavy As Stone
description: Investigate a series of deaths on behalf of the Atsmith Life Insurance Co., uncovering the relationship between these cases and the cause of your mysterious illness. Adapt to your disease and survive Terminal's seedy underbelly as you face the consequences of your search for answers.

name: Histoire de Lune
description: Histoire de Lune is an indie adventure game by Suits & Sandals. Explore the kingdom of Lunaire, finding weapons, upgrades and other collectables on your way. Fight against monsters deep underground and uncover the mysteries surrounding the disaster that struck the kingdom centuries ago.

name: Masters of Cards
description: Masters of Cards is a free collectible card game inspired by the classic Heróis e Vampiros. It offers innovative mechanics, strategic gameplay, and balanced starting decks to ensure fairness. Players can build and evolve their decks over time, customize their characters, and compete in exciting battles. With fast-paced battles, new features, and improved stability, MAOC delivers a fast, stable, and engaging card game experience.

name: BS Zelda Restoration Map 1
description: A which restores the content and playability of BS Zelda no Densetsu, which was never officially localized, and its original files are partially lost in time due to being released via radio broadcasting. Through its MSU-1 support, it optionally adds CD-quality audio.

description: A four-part mod which restores the content and playability of BS Zelda no Densetsu: Inishie no Sekiban, which was never officially localized, and its original files are partially lost in time due to being released via radio broadcasting. Through MSU-1 support, it optionally adds CD-quality English dub.

name: TCG Trading Card Shop Sim
description: Manage your own TCG shop! Stock cards, figurines, customise the interior, and expand your store. Let people compete in your shop and build a personal card collection of rare finds!

name: Goombario's Quest
description: Goombario's Quest is a Mario fangame where you embark on a great adventure as Goombario to save the Mushroom World from Goomboss's evil plans. Join Goombario and Goombella on this epic quest to stop Goomboss from getting the Cosmic Star!

name: Run An Empire
description:
A fun, free motivation to move further! Capture real world places and compete against neighbors with every step you take.

Whether walking to your workplace or running a marathon, capture the places you move through to build a formidable empire. Explore further to collect resources and earn great fortunes. Lead your people from the dawn of time to the Space Age.

“Don a pair of sneakers and run (jog, or walk) to victory” Engadget

Set in a war-torn land where the forces of light and darkness battle for dominance, players assume the role of a hero destined to shape the outcome of the ongoing conflict.

name: The Wheels of Lull
description: Return to Sotha Sil and enter the stranger side of TES lore, as you join the ranks of the mysterious Chronographers in this fully voiced DLC sized quest mod that adds over 10 new quests, multiple new armors and weapons, sprawling dungeons, unique boss fights, and much much more!

name: Wyrd Waters
description: Wyrd Waters is a fast-paced, tactical multiplayer naval game set in a world inspired by Anglo-Saxon mythology. Join forces or face off with up to 8 friends as you command your fleet, outwit rivals, and navigate perilous, kraken-infested seas!

name: Journey to the Void
description: Prepare to fend off attacks from all directions in this hybrid strategy roguelite deck builder. On your journey through varied grid-based biomes, battle unique foes and make tough moral choices to restore a corrupted land and decide the fate of your world.

name: Sagas of Lumin
description: Sagas of Lumin is a single player action RPG, where players can tame and ride powerful dragons. Engage in epic aerial battles against flying galleons or other dragon riders. Partake in ground combat; combine different melee weapons, firearms, and spells to come up with your unique combat style.

name: Mad Mechs
description: Vehicular combat shooter with map-altering environments and exhilarating high-speed battles. Customize your mech and fight through dynamic levels that change over time. Upgrade your arsenal, face off against powerful bosses, and dominate the ever-evolving battlegrounds.

Every character has their own mind so promote the loyal, scheme against rivals and imprison the disobedient.

name: Conquest Tactics: Realm of Sin
description: Conquest Tactics: Realm of Sin is a dark fantasy roguelite with hex-based, turn-based tactical combat. Command your forces, make impactful choices, and navigate a realm consumed by sin—will you restore order or surrender to darkness?

name: Stunt Bike Extreme
description: Stunt Bike Extreme is a motocross racing game. Compete around the world through adrenaline-pumping tracks.

Explore the lands of a once-prosperous island, hone your combat skills, and survive in the unforgiving realm of the Kingdom of the Seven.

name: Fire Emblem: Immortal Sword
description: A fan-made prequel to the popular Fire Emblem: Blazing Sword (FE7), Fire Emblem: Immortal Sword (FE7x) is the tale of a vast conspiracy to throw the world of Elibe into chaos, and of three young leaders caught in its wake. A tale of questionable alliances, political intrigue, and the confusion of conflict. Follow a cast of your favorite characters in a brand new adventure, as their mettle is tested in both battlefields and moral dilemmas. Explore a world of new classes, skills, and features that bring the classic land of Elibe into a modern standard of tactical depth.

name: Barry Bonds enter the world of Myst
description:
Barry Bonds, surreal adventures, and the becoming his world thereof

An adventure game set in the world of MYST starring Barry Bonds, made by Jon Bois for the website Progressive Boink, back in 2005.

name: Adventures of a Cat in Space
description: Adventures of a Cat in Space is a family-friendly point & click adventure. After being accidentally launched into space, a cat is on a mission to find their way back home. Along the way you will need to solve puzzles and explore distant planets across the galaxy to unlock original music and songs to power up your navigation system and get back to Earth in this cosy adventure purrrfect for all ages.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Cell To Kogeki Da
description: Conversion of the Sega System 32 arcade original Dragon Ball Z: V.R.V.S.. No prototype has surfaced.

name: Go-Go! Grapplestaff
description:
Go! Go! Grapple Staff is a fast paced, momentum based, 2.5d platformer set in a magical cartoony realm.

The Meddling "Grapple Wizard", once a meagre wizard, now blessed with the knowledge of the deathly-efficient and recently outlawed Grapple Staff, geared up with their pointy hat is able to tear through anyone (or anything) that stands in their way. Mischief, chaos and high speeds are the aims of the game in the Grapple Wizards mission to ascend the peak of the Wizard Council - who banished the Grapple Wizard for their use of the Grapple Staff.

name: Apricity
description:
The world grows cold, and the walls of your sanctuary begin to crumble under the weight of overwhelming darkness.
Gather soul energy and fortify yourself against sinister forces. Journey to find the light in the shadows, restore the garden and push back the night.

name: LittleBigPlanet 3: Line Infantry Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: RetroBlazer
description: Take on the mantle of the Pyramid Guard, go up against the cybernetic Ark Legion, and rid the kingdom of a spectral blight. Combining the charm of Saturday Morning Cartoons and the bombastic action of late 90s shooters, RetroBlazer recaptures a golden era of frantic, fast-paced, first-person action.

name: Wildaria
description: Wildaria is an Action-Adventure RPG Pet Collector set in an Infinite Fantasy World. Explore diverse open-world biomes as you collect and train unique pets to aid in your quest to conquer dungeons, slay gods, or defend the natural world from the kingdom.

name: Purrrifiers: Cleaning Chaos
description: Purrrifiers is a hilarious 4-player co-op game about cleaning while causing chaos. Solve puzzles, drive quirky vehicles, use an array of cleaning tools and team up with adorable cats. Experience absurd humor, diverse locations, and non-stop fun as you collaborate or troll your way to cleaning glory!

name: Map Map: A Game About Maps
description: Embark on a cozy treasure hunt as cartographer of an adventure crew. Use your sense of direction to make maps, help your companions and explore idyllic islands.

name: Dead Dock Protocol
description:
A neon-bloody action cyberpunk zombie shooter from Game Studio 1979.

Introducing Dead Dock Protocol, a thrilling cyberpunk zombie shooter packed with intense, neon-blood-soaked action! Embark on a crucial mission to rescue six besieged city zones from the clutches of Zombots and their formidable bosses. Whether you fight alongside your team or venture alone, your objective is to stay alive and eradicate the hordes of Zombots.

name: Portal: Singularity Collapse
description: Explore a new wing of Aperture Science focused on the creation of Portal Guns. Play as a scientist working at this research centre, and traverse it's remains after an unforeseen accident sends you forward in time. Go through never before seen areas with new technology in order to return.

name: Portal: System Failure
description: Portal: System Failure is a community made standalone modification for Portal 2 built on the Source Engine, set within the Portal universe.

name: Culinarium
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal: Ambition
description: Portal: Ambition is a semi-story-driven campaign that offers hours of gameplay through puzzles and out-of-bounds tasks. Complete requests by an unknown scientist from a different section of the facility, help retrieve important information and data.

name: Portal: Alive & Kicking
description: Portal: Alive & Kicking is a full remake and re-imagining of Valve's award-winning title, Portal.

name: Grimgig Railway
description: Grimgig Railway is a horror game with train simulation elements where you’ll need to keep calm and face your fears. You’ll drive the train across an old railway in Sakura valley, deep in the Japanese countryside. Drive the train and find soon enough why not everyone can keep this job.

name: World of Warcraft: The War Within - Undermine(d)
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocket Legend
description: In Pocket Legend, a roguelike deck-builder, you control a hero transported to a world of legendary weapons. Strategically arrange items in your inventory to defeat enemies with unique attack patterns. Customize your setup, unlock powerful cards, and uncover the fate of the dark forces.

name: Escaping Agent
description: The AMP mansion has never been crazier in Escaping Agent! Agent00 has lost his precious hats, and he’s gone off the rails. Your mission? Collect them all while avoiding a very angry—and very determined—Agent. Fail, and you’ll be in for quite the surprise. Succeed and you’ll save the day by bringing Agent back to his senses!

name: Birdo vs. Macintosh
description: Join BIRDO on a quest unlike any other: a mission to stop the evil Steve Jobs from sullying the good name of Windows 95 (and the soon to be released Windows 98) using a smear campaign that goes far and wide across the vast landscapes of Silicon Valley. It's up to you, a lowly pink Birdo named "Birdo", to stop the antics of the recently reestablished CEO before things are too late in Computer Land, 1997.

name: The Legend of Zelda: New Beginnings
description: Sin descripción

name: Magikoopa Security Force
description: Magikoopa Security Force is a new take on the Tower Defense genre - instead of constructing towers to stop generic enemy units, one must strategically place Minions-Bowser's minions, that is-in a level to stop a decidedly nonuniform onslaught of Shy Guys. It is as much a game of Tower Defense as it is a game of action, as the Magikoopa you control is just as capable of defeating attackers as one's minions. Casting offensive spells and summoning aid requires time, and the determined Shy Guys don't give you any time between waves to relax. After clearing a stage, one is awarded coins and a rank, based on the amount of coins remaining from the mission.

name: The Greatest Chef
description: Sin descripción

name: Limscape
description: A first-person exploration game where you walk through eerie and realistic spaces, searching for an exit. Powered by Unreal Engine's Lumen, it's perfect for those who enjoy quiet walks or simple games. Use the sandbox feature to create your own space! Requires a DirectX12-compatible GPU.

name: Ricave
description: Ricave is a turn-based, first-person dungeon crawler inspired by the wild nature of traditional roguelikes and designed around readability, intuitive mechanics, and transparency.

name: Sakuna Chronicles: Kokorowa and the Gears of Cretion
description: Spin-off of Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin, the game will tell a spin-off story focused on the brilliant Princess Kokorowa, Sakuna’s close friend, who is a high-ranking goddess presiding over wheels and inventions from her heavenly home.

name: Lythe The Forgetful Witch
description: Sin descripción

name: One More Plate
description: Sin descripción

name: HeartWeaver
description: Help Ace reconnect with her emotions in this 3D puzzle-platformer adventure game alongside Mark, a loudmouth magic tome. Explore the worlds of Ace's mind, solve puzzles using the abilities of her emotions and recover her memories. Guide her to make the decisions that'll take her to healing inside.

name: Hollow Doll
description: Hollow Doll is a first-person survival horror game set in a post-humanity earth inhabited by remnant "doll" life. Follow the elusive netdiver, Cel, as she chases after the whispers of a dead network known as the Red_Sea. Explore dystopian megastructure locales and exorcise the corrupted ghosts of drowned netdivers bleeding from the Red_Sea.

name: Islets Defense
description: Islets Defense is a turn-based tower defense game where you build a small village to earn resources and defend your castle.

name: Jelly Truck
description:
Ever wondered what it would be like to steer a truck through a jelly-filled world? Well, wonder no longer, Jelly Truck is here.
Drive your Jelly Truck across all the obstacles to complete each level. Aim is to get the Jelly Truck to the finish flag to level up.

Can you drive your wobbly jelly truck all the way to the flag at the end of each level? You will have to roll and jiggle your way across the many obstacles along the way. Everything is made of jelly, so this truck driving game is quite challenging! Good luck!

Fantastic driving game, in which you are driving the truck made of… jelly! This wiggling vehicle is quite tricky to drive, so drive carefully and get to the finish line as quickly as possible.

Get behind the wheel and try to reach the end of each level! Everything in this world has been made out of jelly, which can make it quite hard to get past certain obstacles.

name: Resident Evil 3: Nemesis - Seamless HD Project
description: The Seamless HD Project is an upscaled, restored and in some cases manually edited remaster that brings old environments, visual effects and game elements into sharper detail.

name: Bloxcalibur
description: Find your sword, and press the space bar to swing it. Your goal is to run, jump, and slash your way to the portal in each level.

name: Golden Tides
description:
Set sail in Golden Tides, a fast-paced PvP pirate Adventure MOBA where teams of four race to hunt for treasure. Engage in thrilling ship battles, fight across dynamic terrains, and experience a new adventure every time you set sail.

In Golden Tides, your legacy is forged not just by the treasures you claim but by the choices you make. With true ownership of your achievements, set forth to make your mark on the world. Chart your course, face the unknown, and become the ultimate pirate legend.

name: Squadron: Ghost
description: Squadron: GHOST is a total conversion mod for Half-Life that was being developed in the early 2000s, inspired by anime, manga, and cyberpunk aesthetics. However, the mod's development was canceled at the time. Despite this, it still impresses considering the era in which it was being developed. There is little information available online about this mod.

name: Relics of Aurelia
description: An rpg that makes various things called relics have a good side and a bad side. You have to discover what they do, and use them to beat the game!

name: GtaGuessr
description: Gtaguessr - Like geoguessr but in GTA. Based in the world of Los Santos figure out where Franklin is taking selfies in Grand Theft Auto 5's world.

name: Monster Hunter Outlanders
description: A new Monster Hunter title for mobile, more similar to the classic series formula.

name: Cycles of Aylorea
description: Cycles of Aylorea is a survival simulation game set in the medieval era. Imagine expansive city building!

name: Super Mario Bros. 3 Advance
description: Sin descripción

name: System Reject
description: System Reject is an exciting sci-fi role-playing game set in an underground laboratory overrun by zombies and robots. Explore and fight for survival with limited resources. Customize weapons, upgrade skills, and engage in intense combat.

name: Cursed Apartment
description: You wake up in your apartment's room. A stranger's voice from voice-recorder tells you that you're trapped in a cursed apartment, infested with anomalies.

name: Battleshots: Chaos Edition
description: Strategize, plot, and maneuver your ships across the game board, carefully targeting your opponent's vessels while safeguarding your own. But beware, as for every attack could be influenced by unpredictable random events that shake up the traditional gameplay dynamics.

name: Fractured Worlds
description: Search for loot, power and answers about a broken, fragmented world in this overhead action RPG with procedural zones and unique multiplayer features.

name: Mortal Coil
description: A reality TV cyberpunk death game: if you die in game, you die in real life!

name: Chaotix Pinball
description: Sin descripción

name: OverKnights
description: Step into the heart of PvP Arena battles where every victory counts in this f2p Card Battler. Test your skills and prove you’re worthy of reaching the top as you customize your OverKnight with powerful Parts and Cards. With each battle, you’ll get closer to becoming the next legendary OverKnight pilot!

name: Creature Oasis
description: Sin descripción

name: Chao Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Dr. Robotnik's Badnik Quarrel
description:
Dr. Robotnik's Badnik Quarrel is an ARENA BRAWLER in which up to eight teams battle against each other with characters from the Sonic The Hedgehog series. Each team is given four 'emeralds' that represent badniks that will fight in an arena during each round.

You must win rounds to score points for your team, which are used to purchase upgrades or randomize your badniks so that they have higher strength or health stats, and sometimes gain special fighting abilities that give them a distinct advantage over other monsters in the arena. There are also special mini games between rounds where players on each team must fight each other.

name: Emerald Fighters
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Hoshi
description: Sonic Hoshi is a 2D fan game that fits in-between the story of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 and 3.

name: Sonic Revisited
description: Sonic Revisited is a new take on recreating the first Sonic game from scratch.

name: Sonic Kick
description: Sonic Kick is a Sonic fangame inspired by the Advance and Rush series, meant to be the combination of Rush's adrenaline-fueling speed and Advance's momentum-oriented origins, all built from the ground up.

name: Sonic Ringworlds
description: Sonic Ringworlds is planned to be an SA1-like Sega Saturn homebrew game.

name: Amy's Rascal Race
description:
Amy’s Rascal Race is fan made spinoff starring Amy Rose! Join Amy as she is spirited away to a mysterious uncharted island by a mysterious gemstone. During her ride, her exposure to the gemstone grants her new ballerina twirling abilities! She is joined by a new foxy buddy where they together with their new ballerina abilities must traverse this island in this new silly 2.5 platformer!

Here you will find that ballerina twirling is not only pretty but deadly to your foes, you will also find that it can also help spin you far and wide and traverse great heights! twirl on walls and ceilings, or twirl off of walls and ramps! Twirl to solve problems and overcome challenges! You better get going then! you will need to twirl to the peak of the island to solve why you were called there!

name: Super Mario XP: Remastered
description:
"Super Mario XP: Remastered" is a restoration project of a 2001 fan-game called "Super Mario XP".
Originally developed by a japanese with the nickname of CnC Darkside back in 2001, Super Mario XP mix both Mario and Castlevania mechanics. Making a cool and original playstyle with it.

Play through the original 7 stages and find new secrets and levels added to the game.

name: Jermle
description: A word guessing game where you can guess "Jerma". Finally!

name: Torchr Runners: Demastered
description: It's an online co-op indie, runner 3d platformer with a bit of puzzle and surreal. "Carry your flickering torch through perilous puzzles in this retro-inspired cooperative platformer. Work together to keep your sanity intact, beat mind-bending challenges, and survive the misanthropic taunts of the "Torcherer" – all while racing against time before your light runs out!"

name: Supra Mayro Bross: Legend of the Lost Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinchimono: The Videogame
description: Sin descripción

name: Cursed Companions
description: Cursed Companions is a co-op horror game where what you say can save or sabotage your team. The game is always listening — say the right words, and you can cast spells or disable traps and unlock rewards. Say the wrong words and you and your teammates will get hurt.

name: The Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: The Great Castle Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Plumber's Parasitic Plant Problem
description: Sin descripción

name: Toads vs. Koopas: Bowser's Conquest
description: Sin descripción

name: Lelu
description:
Get your gears in motion for a captivating monochromatic adventure where you play as Lelu, a small but determined clockwork toy who has gained consciousness and found a taste for freedom!

Navigate your way through the toy factory, a labyrinthian tower filled with puzzles and traps set by the factory’s eccentric guardian. Use your wits and agility to overcome challenges, from conveyor belts and electrifying circuits to sentient toys and towering toy titans.
As you delve deeper into the world, uncover hidden abilities to aid you in your quest, alongside a variety of secrets and other toys sharing your desire for freedom.

Will you find your way to the elusive exit, or will you just be another toy on the shelf?

name: Target Strikers: Deadly Dart
description: Target Strikers: Deadly Dart is a puzzle game made by Mors and Shell Master Tortwag with high definition graphics using Game Maker 8. This game is the sequel for Deadly Dart.

name: Abducted Toad 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Hearts of Iron IV: The Great War
description: Hearts of Iron IV: The Great War, an overhaul mod for Hearts of Iron IV, puts you in the position of one of the countries of the world in World War One's time period. In an era where the stakes were high and risks even higher, you'll have to tread lightly when it comes to diplomacy. A single mistake or a single bluff gone too far could mean the deaths of millions.

name: L'Odyssée Sibérienne: Le Rêve Utile de Nicolas Vanier
description: A french game about Nicolas Vanier siberian odyssee

name: Sethi and the Inca Wizard
description: la Qoyä, the wife of the emperor is dying from a strange curse. This is no surprise you will help. As Sethi, and with your companion Pepi, you decide to investigate to defeat the enemies of the Empire. You will have to explore places such as Cuzco, Lake Titicaca, the Mountain of the Spirits, the Temple of the Sun, and so on, talk to people, find and use items. Since this game is educational, you will learn about the culture of the Incas.

name: Robinson Crusoe
description: As Robinson Crusoe, a 17th-century castaway, you must survive on a tropical island in this action-adventure game. Explore a dynamic world, uncover secrets, craft tools, build shelters, and defend against dangers. Your choices shape your fate—will you conquer the wilds or fall victim to them?

name: Viscera Cleanup Detail 2
description: On the 26th of February 2024 it was announced that RuneStorm was "confident that we have more than enough material for a sequel and lots of interesting improvements to add".

name: Sonic Metallix
description: Sin descripción

name: Trivia About You
description:
"Trivia About You" is a romance visual novel about furry characters sharing meaningful moments in Carol’s House.

After moving into the shop, you become roommates with three charming furry characters. Through daily life, from spring to autumn, you slowly build deeper connections with them.

name: Tentacles Invasion
description: On the way back to Earth, the space freighter Nostromo 2 encounters an emergency, and crew member Veronica Wenger is awakened from cryosleep. The ship is infested with mysterious creatures, and there is no communication with the other 9 crew members. In response to the computer "HOLLY9000," Veronica embarks on a mission to save her fellow crewmates.

name: Sonic: The Murdering Insanity
description: Sonic The Murdering Insanity is a RPG Horror Sonic game. With chases, complex boss fights and voice acting.

name: Lancen Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Fly-High and Huggy: Unstoppable
description: The harder version of Fly-High and Huggy for older kids transitioning away from CBeebies, on the CBBC website

name: Fly-High and Huggy: Unstoppable
description: The easier version of Fly-High and Huggy for younger kids transitioning into CBBC, on the CBeebies website

name: Avante! Atlantis
description: Avante! Atlantis is a turn-based tactical game where the rise of Atlantis triggers a fierce global race for it's domination. Lead your nation through the ever-changing, mythical city, battling foes and uncovering the secrets that kept Atlantis hidden for centuries.

name: Hellfire
description: In Hellfire the player plays a "basher" in the early 1980s - a "basher" is a railway enthusiast who seeks to ride behind as many different locomotives as possible. At the start of the game, the player is given a randomly-generated list of locomotives that have not been travelled behind, and scores points by filling out this list, gaining more points by riding behind rarer locomotives. The game ends after an in-game week, but the points earned can be used in future games to buy tickets for rarer services such as sleeper trains. The game includes the entirety of the British Rail network at the time, with locomotives assigned based on the real-life timetables.

name: Hawken Skate Boarder
description: Sin descripción

name: Echoes of Vision
description: Echoes of Vision is set in Cold Mountain, a city with an enigmatic atmosphere characterized by brutalist architecture reminiscent of the Cold War era. Strange occurrences with supernatural origins are not uncommon in the city, often caused by elusive entities beyond human comprehension.

name: Fight Tennis
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Fighters Blitz
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Kizuna
description: Announced during the Great Aquaplus Festival 30th Anniversary, it is a new RPG written by Suga Munemitsu, the creator of Utawarerumono.

name: Negative Reverie
description:
Negative Reverie is a retro-handheld-inspired RPG about technology, violence and animal intelligence... or the lack thereof.

Face the darkest side of Corporate America with Vuota, a young woman with a natural talent for violence, a hacksaw, and a mission to take down the CEO of the FamilyTech Corporation. With the right skills, tactics, outfits and allies, she might be able to overcome the oppression of modern technology culture... and possibly discover something even darker waiting below...

name: Godspeed: A Flame for Winter
description: Godspeed: A Flame for Winter is a Hearts of Iron IV total overhaul mod focused around a wildly divergent alternate history and an emphasis on storytelling. In Godspeed, you fight not over revanchism, ideologies, or which version of Germany won which version of World War I, but over you and your faction's grand plan for the world after the war is over.

name: Jasmine
description: Jasmine was originally announced in 2011, but was cancelled in 2015. However, in 2024, it was announced that development would resume.

name: Love Finds A Whey
description:
Which cheese will you take to the summer festival? And will you achieve your dream of becoming an artisanal cheesemaker?! Get ready for a romance that will make you melt.

"Love Finds A Whey" is a short parody dating sim.

name: Sample Sonic
description: Sin descripción

name: Raion
description:
Raion is a momentum-based platformer with multiple paths to complete each stage. It’s a continuous runner with a twist:
Raion’s speed is determined by the environment. Going uphill? He’ll slow down. Running downhill? You better be ready for some speed.

name: Megaman X and Zero: Training Missions
description: In the time between Megaman X3 and X4, witness the grueling training that prepare X and Zero for the next Maverick outbreak!

name: Megaman Legends 1.5
description:
Megaman and Roll have picked up abnormally strong refractor signals deep below Merida Island.

Join them as they uncover the mystery underneath this bustling town!

name: Spanky Attourney Ch.1
description:
This is a parody game of Ace Attourney by Capcom

Follow the path of a rookie lawyer, Winchester, and unravel the truth of a ( really small ) case, however if you fail, the punishment waiting for your client would be cruel and unforgiving.

name: Zelda Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Behind the Brush!
description: The main character, an art student new to University life, is having issues settling so they try to escape their daily life by telling a story through art. However, their emotions take a toll on this fictional world and the negative emotions manifest in this world as enemies and it's up to the main character to face and overcome them.

name: Kaiserredux
description: KaiserreduX started out in late 2019 as a collection of various submods for Kaiserreich, later evolving into a unified submod turned fork and eventually - thanks to the continuous addition of new content, wider sweeping changes to lore and setting, and ever widening differences in design philosophies between the original base of the KR mod and KX - into a wholly separate entity that is in no way affiliated with KR beyond sharing the conceptual ideas for the timeline, albeit with many differences, and the base for the mod, so do not run the two mods together; KX is a standalone product. While KX has kept a considerable amount of pre-existing KR lore, much of which has changed by now, it has also introduced a lot of new elements and additions going beyond the scope of the timeline created back in the days of Kaiserreich for Darkest Hour.

name: Pax Britannica: An Imperial Timeline
description:
Welcome to Pax Britannica: An Imperial Timeline, an alternate history science fiction mod for Hearts of Iron 4.
Taking place in the wake of a failed American Revolution, the mod focuses on the substantial changes this causes in world history, compounded by the success of Nikola Tesla's Wireless Power Concept. The Victorian Era has been flash frozen by this advancement, creating an anarchic mix of the Jazz Age, Wellsian science fiction and transhumanism. The world is both familiar and utterly alien, and the mod seeks to explore that universe and provide a unique style compared to other overhaul mods.

name: Stars Reach
description: Stars Reach is a sandbox science-fantasy MMO where you explore deeply simulated living worlds in a shardless galaxy, fight aliens in action combat, and live in a fully player-driven economy full of peaceful ways to play. You and your friends can govern a planet!

name: Cheerwine Deluxe 3
description: Prince Edward Island has been ripped out of the earth, and only Yoshi can save Canada from these vile forces!

name: Yoshi's Dreamer 2: Tropical Island
description: Sin descripción

name: You
description:
I NEED TO TALK TO GOD.

After the sun murdered the moon, and her corpse flooded all the earth, YOU wants to talk to god to ask him one single question. You can transform into a gold statue, this form will help you advance your drowned world and find yourself in it.

Find the god of the sun before he finds you.

YOU is an abstract psychological-horror with driven narrative with puzzles aspects to

YOU features flashing images, artistic nudity, light gore, explicit language, as well as themes of abuse and suicide. The play session is around 45–60 minutes.

name: Tasty Planet Dinotime
description: Control a tiny ball of grey goo with the ability to eat anything smaller than itself. The more it eats, the bigger it gets! After eating a time machine, you'll be sent back to the time of the dinosaurs. There are lots of tasty things to eat back then.

name: Edmund
description: Sin descripción

name: Time Dudes
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixeltroid
description: Sin descripción

name: Blooper's Revenge DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Dairanto!! Mario Bros. DDX
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Bobble: Return of Great Dragon
description: Sin descripción

name: MLB Perfect Inning 24
description: Officially licensed MLB Baseball Game! Dive into an MLB live mobile baseball game, featuring the 2023 Willie Mays World Series MVP, Corey Seager! Experience the unique thrill of the real-time PvP baseball game in MLB Perfect Inning 24!

name: Lishogi
description: Lishogi is a free online shogi game server focused on realtime gameplay and ease of use.

name: Lidraughts
description: Play international draughts (on a 10X10 board), or draughts variants on an 8x8 board, online and offline, against other players and against the computer. Built for the love of draughts, this app is open source and free for all.

name: Pacman Worlds
description: Sin descripción

name: Mushroom Oasis
description:
Your beloved cat has been missing for a few days. You suspect she's run off into the woods across the street, a bad habit she does whenever she manages to get a paw out the door behind your back. The forest wasn't known to be dangerous, quite peaceful in fact, but her being an indoor pet has you worried regardless.

Though being an indoor person yourself, you wound up wandering far deeper than you intended. Lucky for you a kind (but odd-looking) stranger stumbled upon you before anything bad happened.

...Let's hope he only has good intentions in bringing you home.

name: Late Night Confessional
description:
Late Night Confessional is a multi protagonist photography-minigame-visual novel about a long time coming break-up and the fast approaching end of the world.

God appeared dead in the sky and the pieces wont stop falling down to Earth. Everyone pretends they don't see it coming. The world moves on as normal. Mary Baker still has to work her low wage fast food job. Her biggest problem right now? She wants to break up with her girlfriend.

name: The Laser Games
description: The Laser Games is a casual/competitive shooter, embracing the thrill and experience from real laser tag. Jump in with friends, strangers, or alone, and explore the various maps and challenges as you zap your way to the top! Play it your way- unlock and equip customizations, or contribute to the workshop with your own maps and gametypes!

name: Timebound
description: An exploration puzzle metroidbrainia set in mystical ruins. Solve timeloop puzzles, explore the open world, learn the rules and break them.

name: Persona 5 Pocket Edition
description: A demake of Persona 5 for the Game Boy.

name: Solitaire Grand Harvest
description: Play Solitaire Grand Harvest and get a sweet 10,000 coins welcome bonus! Play this fun, free TriPeaks Solitaire game! Endless fun solitaire games & a solitaire farm that's just waiting for you to build it!

name: Super Mario Bros. SNES Days
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bros. SNES Days 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreadway
description: A co-op horror about surviving a nuclear apocalypse as a small group of people on a train, scavenging for various scrap to upgrade the train.

name: Call of Elyndra
description:
CALL OF ELYNDRA, where farming meets adventure! Grow crops, battle monsters in real-time combat, upgrade your village and solve ancient quests across five epic realms.

Play as you want--cozy or action-driven. In Elyndra, farming meets fantasy!

name: Red Flood
description: Red Flood is a mod for Hearts of Iron IV set in an alternate timeline where nobody won World War I.

name: Gator Brigade
description: A game by Oddfellows Software that was formerly know as "Broken Hearts Club - Blue Bird Blues". Not much is public about it and the developers are currently on hiatus so its development is currently up in the air.

name: Tetris Kuromi Sanrio Key Chain Game Console
description: Tetris Kuromi Sanrio Key Chain Game Console is an LCD Tetris clone based on the Sanrio character Kuromi.

name: Paradise
description:
PARADISE is built with advanced AI-driven technologies. The game features a living, breathing world where traffic patterns, pedestrian behavior, and daily activities mimic real-life.

Infrastructure & Nature: From ocean to city bustling with unique locations such as police station, banks, airport and stores, each offering a variety of activities.

AI Trafic: Realistic driving behaviors, where vehicles adhere to traffic laws, get into accidents and respond dynamically to player interactions.

Dynamic activities: Dive into activities from racing to shooting. Work jobs, complete missions, and buy cars, clothes, and property to enrich your game life.

name: OttGiu
description:
An otter on the way to save your friends.

Follow Giuseppe on this adventure!

name: Bad Time Trio
description: This is the original bad time trio. by mcatr

name: Astronomicon
description: In this atmospheric puzzle game with cute original art and music, you're playing as a navigator of a small caravel. Study the constellations and test your visual perception skills to find your way in the endless ocean.

name: Kamen Rider Decade
description: Mod for the 2017 indie game Slay The Spire, based on the Kamen Rider series, and the "Kamen Rider Decade" installment

name: Mana Monsters
description:
Mana Monsters is a completely fresh and epic take on classic free match 3 puzzle games!

Collect, hatch, level and upgrade a multitude of mighty mana monsters, create an elite battle team, and compete for ultimate glory by testing your skills in the arena against the best players in the world!

name: Mecha Arena
description: The objective of this advanced mecha-builder RPG game game is to carefully construct, upgrade, and maintain your own combat robot. Do battle against other mechas in random and competition matches and tournaments. Train the skills of the mecha rider, hire staff for the mecha garage, and much more!

name: Eufloria Classic
description: Eufloria Classic brings back the original charms of the long-unavailable indie classic, updated for a new age with a plethora of new content and features, including extreme moddability.

name: Cryptic Crawlz
description:
Cryptic Crawlz: Dive into the depths of an enigmatic dungeon where mystery and danger lurk at every turn. Combining the thrilling action of a Hack-and-Slash RPG with the cerebral challenges of a point-and-click adventure,

Cryptic Crawlz offers a unique gaming experience. Embark on a journey filled with dark secrets, treacherous puzzles, and formidable foes as you navigate the labyrinthine corridors. Unravel the cryptic lore and conquer sinister adversaries in this spellbinding fusion of Hack-and-Slash combat and intricate puzzle-solving. Are you prepared to uncover the secrets that lie beneath?

name: Late Night Sausage
description:
In the sparse, remote reaches of northern Sweden, Late Night Sausage plunges you into a horror experience inspired by chilling true events that may feel disturbingly familiar.

Complete your nightly chores: take out the garbage, do the laundry and most importantly, grab a sausage at the local gas station. As night falls, mundane routines twist into chilling encounters. Each event reveals more about the townsfolk and every night brings new dark discoveries. Can you maintain your sanity in this horror walking simulation?

name: Vtubers Network
description: This game is about Jynx, Zero, Ichi, and Rel trying to escape this game made by Ai their friend. So their job is to find their friend Ai to see him But they need to fight against all Ai's friends worldwide. But first, WE JUST NEED SOME MONEY (reference)

name: Symphony of the Stars
description: A retro RPG that features puzzles, exploration, and turn-based combat.

name: Nightly Hobo
description: You have lost everything and now you have to loot dumpsters and return bottles to feed yourself.

name: The Devious Four Chronicles 8: Goddess Robes
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternity
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Ancient Keys
description: Sin descripción

name: Ancient Keys DX
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Horn of Balance
description: A fangame inspired by A Link to the Past, which ultimately became an original IP, Horn of Balance.

name: Fortnite: Kyran Aryk Crew Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Kamalatale
description: Kamala is tasked with fighting for a New Way Forward that protects our fundamental freedoms and strengthens our democracy! Debate your way through a divided nation, secure endorsements and future voters, and finish what your mentor, Joe Biden, started!

name: The Overnight Watch
description:
Welcome Subject/Employee to 'The Overnight Watch'. This experiment/exam will take a total of 5 business days to complete.

Your objective during this experiment/exam is to watch the cameras and report anything that you find out of the ordinary.

Each day you will be pushed even further by watching more rooms and having to keep an eye on the Power Containment Drive. Failure is NOT an option.

Do you 'IRIS SUBJECT NUMBER' wish to apply to 'The Overnight Watch'?

Please note:

IRIS will not take responsibility for a subject's death during this test.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A basic Tic Tac Toe game for Vircon32, made by Chandler Kluser. This version is 2-player only, so you will need a second gamepad to play with a friend.

name: Party Man
description: Party Man, by Srxraposo, is a Pac-Man clone where you have to keep drinking more beer!

name: JellyFish
description: In this game by TheR you control a jellyfish swimming underwater among other animals and trying to not get hit by them. Some of them will actively try to hit you. Try to get a high score and save it in your memory card.

name: Loopdio
description: Loopido is a minimalistic platform puzzle game where you need to get a ball through a warp field. Depending on the game mode you either control the ball or the world.

name: Speedy Speedy Cat Slowly
description: A single button run game. You can use ropes and balloons to advance. There is also a gravity reversal.

name: Royalty Free-For-All
description: Royalty Free-For-All is a hand-drawn cartoon Party Brawler featuring an original cast of characters inspired by the public domain! Join Dorothy, Sweeney Todd, Mother Goose, and more as they duke it out in hand-drawn platform fighting mayhem!

name: Fracas
description: Fracas is a dungeon crawler that evokes a retro RPG experience and a complex story. In its short duration, it seeks to keep you intrigued as you solve the mystery behind this enigmatic character that has society on the brink of collapse.

name: Borderline
description: Borderline is a free running first person adventure heavily inspired by the momentum-based gameplay from Mirror’s Edge. You are tasked with working against the city of Greyhawke’s most notorious mega corporations, uncovering their secrets while navigating through their state-of-the-art security.

name: Mushroom Kingdom Showdown 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Burst!
description: Burst! is the science-powered rhythm game that puts you in charge of a fireworks show! You blow up fireworks to the beat while swapping out elements from the Periodic Table to change the explosion colors!!

name: Shades
description: Shades is a really immersive solo FPS with infiltration, espionage and tactical extraction shooter aspects, to do a variety of missions as a mercenary for an agency that really use your skills to make this world better.

name: Tails' Picross
description: Tails' Picross is a fangame inspired by the Picross game series and other Mega Drive puzzle games. In this game, you will need to clear puzzles using the clues on each row and each collumn of the grid.

Further Skies takes place in 2008, following a pair of childhood friends adjusting to the ever-shifting world of online communication and relationships, which allows their world to become ever larger - for better and for worse.

This is a story about being a young person in an online age that doesn't quite exist in the form it once did anymore. About communication, paranoia, grief, the joy of finding your people and your place, and the road to equanimity and internal harmony.

The game is also built around a story unlike most shmups, telling a different tale with each of it's main characters.

ChronoVenture is a momentum-based Gameboy-style platformer shooter where the player controls a cat named Lizzy as she runs, jumps, claws and shoots her way to the end of the level where she'll encounter against a boss to unlock a new weapon or ability before she finds herself warping into the future.

Taking inspiration from Sonic CD, you start off in Act 1 during the present or past of a stage where you can either focus on completing an objective that changes the future in Act 2 for the better or reach to the end as fast as you can for a tougher challenge.

Course of Temptation is a detailed adult college life simulator. It’s text-based and runs right in your browser.

Featuring a detailed simulation with hundreds of possible events and erotic scenes, you can explore your exhibitionist, voyeuristic, and debauched fantasies through your character.

A detailed life simulator! Manage your character’s day-to-day needs, skills, attitudes, clothes, and so on. A different story every day! Make plans as you like. Go to class. See a movie. Work out at the gym. Make some questionable side bets at the arcade. But expect surprises.

Hundreds of events mean you can never be sure exactly what will happen. An erotic narrative. Long-term plotlines with recurring characters will play out over time, including erotic prose that’s reactive to your character and your decisions.

Starting in a basic shipping container, you have been left a small list of suppliers and customers from your late uncle to carry on his legacy.

Kind of a cheap legacy, the guy couldn't even afford more than a shipping container. Anyway, build your way up from there, earning renown with both customers and suppliers! The more you buy and ship, the more you CAN...buy and ship! Supply the whole world with Fulfillment Center Simulator!

name: Rethawed
description:
Breathe new life into Tony Hawk's American Wasteland on PC with reTHAWed, a comprehensive mod that injects the game with a massive dose of fresh content and long-awaited fixes.

Shred with a legendary roster of skaters, including those previously cut from the game or those that hail from other Tony Hawk's Pro Skater titles.

reTHAWed doesn't just expand your skater selection, it lets you customize them further than ever with a wealth of new clothing, hats, and deck options.

Experience classic levels from across the Tony Hawk's franchise all while battling
your friends online thanks to the mods restored and improved multiplayer functionality.

On top of that, reTHAWed tackles lingering bugs in the original game, introduces a custom launcher for ease of use, and even throws in widescreen support and adjustable physics for a fine-tuned skateboarding experience.

With frequent updates adding even more content, reTHAWed is the ultimate way to revisit and revitalize Tony Hawk's American Wasteland.

name: Squidward Tentacles Jigsaw
description:
You can find particular games which storm your brain even in the initial handful of minutes of game play. These games will make the gamer use his brain for the maximum and finally he will likely be a believe tank of this game. Squidward Tentacles Jigsaw is such a puzzle game that is capable to test your patience and Intelligence quotient. The game attributes 4 difficulty levels and you can opt for 1 based on your experience. You will be offered a shattered Squidward image and you will need to arrange the shattered pieces into a totally fledged snap. A timer is equipped to monitor your moves and this adds the thrill with the game. As a gamer, you’ll need to fight with time as well as your brain to turn out to be a successful puzzle solver. It is possible to use your left mouse button to play this intriguing game. The photographs used in this game are cool and also the sound effects are fantastic.

Use your mouse to play this game

description: Select the geographical region answering the question in a series of 5 questions. The questions get harder as you go on.

name: Mircea
description: Mircea is a short spooky adventure game. Explore a subway infested by mysterious, bug-like beings. Investigate and understand the monsters to capture them... before they capture you.

name: Defend Earth: Xenos Survivors
description: You are Earth's last line of defense in a relentless alien invasion. Experience intense top-down roguelite action across diverse landscapes, fighting invaders with a versatile arsenal. Outsmart, outgun, and survive your foes. Every run increases the challenge - so adapt, evolve, dominate!

name: White Knuckle
description: White Knuckle is a first person speed climbing game. Ascend through the guts of SUB-STRUCTURE 17 using precision movement mechanics. Sharp reflexes and resource management will take you to the highest peaks under ten thousand meters of concrete and decay.

name: Satanic
description: Satanic is a first-person survival horror game about escaping a satanic cult. Hunted by a relentless demon that responds to your actions, you must avoid detection, scavenge for resources, and navigate your way through an ex-soviet missile silo deep below the surface.

name: My Last Friday
description: My Last Friday is a first-person horror-adventure game with a disturbing atmosphere, clever puzzles, body horror, and tense combat. Explore a twisted world, confront terrifying enemies, and endure the nightmarish challenges ahead.

name: Void Scout
description: Save reality one mission at a time! A seemingly unimportant Void Scout gets thrown into the middle of an interdimensional war, as the only one who can prevent the Exoforms from consuming reality. Strategize, plan, and execute in a suspenseful tactical roguelike. Save the multiverse and die trying!

name: Project Songbird
description: Project Songbird is a cinematic first-person narrative horror game set in the Appalachian forest. Take on the role of Dakota, a musician who must record their new album in a remote log cabin amidst a writer's block. Take caution, however. These woods were never empty...

name: Placid Plastic Deck: A Quiet Quest
description: A wholesome game where you can’t die. A relaxing and witty adventure featuring colorful pixel-art locations, peculiar characters, quirky dialogues, elements of deck-building card battles, and a lot of ducks. A tale of friendship and revenge!

name: Dreadborne Dungeon
description: Dreadborne Dungeon is a pixel art, retro shooter inspired by old school games like Doom and Heretic, as well as mechanics taken from Souls Like games and dungeon crawlers. Explore dark dungeons, fight enemies and survive in a retro-styled world. Die, draw conclusions and don't give up! Good Luck!

name: Gravity Strike
description: Physics based action game. Use gravity forces to manipulate dynamic objects to destroy your enemies.

name: Rise of The Newborns
description: In a dystopian world consumed by the VAS, become one of the Newborn: A new generation of humans immune to the plague, surviving the ravages of disease, mutants, and sinister AXIOM. Fight for hope, rise against the odds, and pave the way for society to be reborn in a unique online sandbox RPG.

name: Cube Zone
description: Cube Zone is an unreleased space shooter by Sega which was set to be released in 1988.

name: Escape Floor 13
description: Escape Floor 13 is a survival-puzzle game with adventure and simulation elements. Set in a mysterious hotel, players are trapped on the 13th floor and must carefully navigate each level to reach safety. The primary goal is to cross each floor and reach the elevator, but supernatural anomalies complicate the journey. If an anomaly is sensed, players must retreat to their starting point to survive. The game’s tense atmosphere is heightened by the ever-present surveillance of the hotel, challenging players to rely on their instincts to escape.

name: Radio_Wishers
description: A Yume Nikki styled game where you follow three amnesiacs trapped in a strange building. The only way these three can recover their memories are through finding them in their dream worlds, and have to work together in order to escape.

name: Changuy: The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Light
description: Dark Light is a pixel art platformer adventure inspired by NES games of the 80s and 90s. You play as John, who is awakened from a peaceful sleep when a lightning strike shatters the silence of the night. As he looks out the window, he witnesses terrifying monsters emerging from the darkness. Armed with improvised tools and driven by curiosity, John embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the source of this strange anomaly and face the growing threats.

name: Gossip
description: Gossip is a video game created for Atari 8-bit computers by then-Atari, Inc. employee Chris Crawford. The documentation indicates that Gossip is an Atari Program Exchange title, but it was not listed in any of the published catalogs and may not have been released at all.

name: Daibouken: Yarinaosu
description: Daibouken: Yarinaosu is an Action Adventure RPG where players explore vibrant worlds, solve puzzles, clear dungeons, and battle foes within a mysterious time loop. Join Aurora as she navigates a fate intertwined with gods and time itself.

name: The Dream Of Yourself
description: "The Dream of Yourself" is about the discovery of the “other” in yourself, through a spiritual exploration of your subconsciousness.

name: Echo Of The Horizon
description: Echo of the Horizon (EOTH) is an open-world RPG built in Unreal Engine 5, featuring single-player and multiplayer modes. Players can form clans, tackle dungeons, engage in PvP, and embark on epic quests in a vast, immersive universe.

name: Meow Cafe
description: Step into Meow Cafe, a charming virtual world where you serve coffee and desserts, rescue stray cats, and help them find loving homes. Inspired by real-life stories from New York City, this game beautifully captures the heartwarming connections between cats and people.

name: Hex
description: Dive into unknown dungeons and fight “HEX”. Use many items to survive in the underworld, Hack & slash action RPG to survive in the underworld! Don't wander around, just keep going!

name: The Exit of Nightmare
description: The Exit of Nightmare is a psychological horror game with collection and puzzle elements. You're trapped in nightmare world and your goal is to find your way back to reality.

name: Forgotten Fables
description: In "Fábulas Porteñas," the subway leaves you at an unknown station, and you must venture in to find a way to get back home. You will solve puzzles and explore while a creature lurks in the shadows.

name: Black Myth: Destiny Man
description: 500 years after the Western Heaven Sutra. The four members of the pilgrimage group have all returned to the west. Those scriptures have also been scattered in various places. Nowadays, despite the absence of saints, demons still run rampant.

name: One Turn Kill
description: One Turn Kill is a PvE card game where card drawing and deck control are the keys to victory. Engage in battles limited to a single turn for an exhilarating, suspenseful experience.Join the protagonist in a pixel art wasteland to face off with the strongest of enemies and see what story awaits.

name: Wild Haven
description: Wild Haven is a nature ecosystem builder. You will build the forest and create a thriving ecosystem. Clean up polluted land, strategically place wildlife together, discover more complex plants and animals and rebuild the ecosystem your way!

name: Arcade Manager
description: Build and manage the Arcade of your dreams. Unlock lots of fully animated games, set their jackpots and build prize zones. Start with a humble local arcade and expand into an major arcade entertainment center!

name: Astral Pursuit
description: Tear through hordes of otherworldly creatures and defeat their ruler before the universe ends. Travel between planets, gather powerful relics, and shape the galaxy to your whim in this objective-based action rogue-lite.

name: Project Delta
description: Challenge the tower solo or co-op in this high-octane sky crawler action rogue-lite. Stack power ups and steal destructive weapons as you dodge, dash and mutilate your way to the top. Your retribution awaits.

name: Fatebound
description: Fatebound is a turn-based kingdom builder where your choices shape the realm’s destiny. Manage resources, build your kingdom, and adapt to dynamic events and seasons that alter the game's flow. Will your empire rise to greatness, or fall to the whims of fate?

name: Rift Drift
description: Rift Drift is a momentum based drifting game, featuring infinite and time trail based game modes in a variety of procedurally generated levels & biomes.

name: Combat Rover: Operation Storm
description: Fight in a war on Mars as a mercenary. Pilot futuristic combat vehicles. Engage in combined arms operations. Choose your own missions in a dynamic war set in a sandbox campaign. Ally yourself with the native Colonists or become rich by fighting for the Corporations.

name: Captain of Space
description: Become a Galactic LegendStart as a space captain with a small ship, mine asteroids, hunt pirates, and build your space empire. Upgrade your ship, hire crew, and conquer sectors. Your goal: become the most powerful in the galaxy!

name: Fox and Shadow
description: Fox and Shadow is a scifi dual deckbuilding roguelike. Scavenge for resources in a broken city to maintain your crumbling bunker. Create a deck that contains your Pilot's emotions with your Drone's logic to destroy defective robots for parts. The world is in ruins, salvage yourself.

name: SCP: A Star Replicator
description: It's an action shooting game that combines the elements of survival and action RPG, Weapons are enhanced with different parts, skills are upgraded to remove SCP. It deals with the unique SCP of the SCP world view, and enjoy casual survival and combat.

name: Worst Case
description: Trapped in a mysterious hotel filled with dark secrets, you must survive the deadly puzzles of a sinister ghost with their loyal assistant. Choose your role: outwit the hunters as a survivor or haunt the intruders as the ghost. Every game brings new chills and challenges.

name: Wolfman
description: You are a wolfman hunter on a critical mission: to uncover the truth and prove that the werewolf is not just a legend, but a real and deadly threat. Your journey will bring you face to face with the beast, as you seek to end the nightmare once and for all.

name: The Magic Garden
description: Welcome to a new fantasy world, where you start a new life in this realm. Explore the mysterious places of this world. Here, you can build farm, meet various characters.By farming, collecting items, and using items and skills, venture into dungeons to defeat monsters and collect rare items.

name: Game About Jetpack Fly
description: This game about jetpack fly. Two thrusters. Two control buttons.

name: Skull Fang
description: Sin descripción

name: Wolf Fang
description: Sin descripción

name: Across the Wonderlands
description:
A whimsical open-world survival crafting game!
Build your magical base dimension and craft fun dishes to fight quirky foes on your journey to the fallen star.

name: Horizon Journey
description: Embark on an epic adventure to Mars in Horizon Journey, an open-world survival game that blends colonization, terraforming, and exploration in both single-player and multiplayer co-op modes. You're tasked with the monumental challenge of making Mars a new home for humanity.

name: Khodam: The Contract
description: A True First-Person Psychological Horror game inspired by Indonesian folklore about the protective unseen spirit, 'Khodam.' Play as Dara, a famous Southeast Asian horror streamer, as she unravels strange anomalies and seeks to uncover her true identity.

name: Shigatsu Youka
description: Sin descripción

name: Fishdle
description:
The only daily game in the word focused on fish, Fishdle is the brainchild of a keen angler who’s specially chosen fish with unique profiles that those who really know there fish will be able to get. Be warned, there are some tough ones that will test the mind of even expert anglers.

Guess the fish from the profile and score points – the fewer hints you need, the more points you score. There are over 50 different fish to guess – one a day. Share the game on social media to build your fishing karma!

name: DZ & Riggy Vs. the Fantasy World
description: Sin descripción

name: Becoming Saint
description: Choose your doctrine and preach across medieval Italy in this real-time strategy roguelike. Gather your diverse cast of followers, venture out to convince and convert new believers, conquer towns, and strive to become a saint in your lifetime — or die trying.

name: Tartaros
description: Jump into a retro-style puzzle adventure that tells the mythical story of Hades and Persephone. Play as Persephone and use magical powers to escape. Encounter mythological creatures, immerse yourself in atmospheric journey and find your way out of the underworld!

name: Star Trek: 20Q
description: Sin descripción
